class.name: VisualShaderNodeVaryingGetter
class.brief_description: A visual shader node that gets a value of a varying.
class.description: Outputs a value of a varying defined in the shader. You need to first create a varying that can be used in the given function, e.g. varying getter in Fragment shader requires a varying with mode set to [constant VisualShader.VARYING_MODE_VERTEX_TO_FRAG_LIGHT].
